verbs.description: PANAMA CITY ( AP ) — The directors of a massive [ARG0: Trump] - [V: branded] [ARG1: luxury condominium development] in Panama fired Donald Trump 's company over the summer over allegations of mismanagement

PANAMA CITY ( AP ) — [ARG0: The directors of a massive Trump - branded luxury condominium development in Panama] [V: fired] [ARG1: Donald Trump 's company] [ARGM-TMP: over the summer] [ARG2: over allegations of mismanagement]
